name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lincoln - Northeast I-80

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was an ideal stop over on our long road trip of the beautiful midwest. From our check in with Sara at the front desk, to the time we left, it was a perfect stay. Beautiful, spacious rooms, excellent staff and location....it doesn't get any better than that!
reviews.title: Couldn't be more perfect!

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Lincoln - Northeast i-80 Hotel Lincoln
